commit message: fix bug which broke anki desktop's card browser searching
don't show upload/download dialog on sync error
add safety question to upload/download option when sanity check fails

Fix bug with latex-file checksum calculation introduced in 5040ef

Empty StringBuffer created but never filled, contents are used to
replace 'latex' string in _latexFromHtml. Thus latexFromHtml always
returns an empty string.

Signed-off-by: Moritz Ulrich <ulrich.moritz@googlemail.com>

Fix Util.checksum's padding for sha1. It must pad to 40 hex digits, not 32

This fixes display of certain LaTeX formulas which hash starts with a
leading zero.

be more precise on delete cram deck dialog
